com.bassintag.tekengine.texture

Class TekTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.texture.TekTexture

  • public class TekTexture
extends java.lang.Object
    TekTexture.java created for TekEngine Represents a texture that can be drawn on the screen
    Since:
    01/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BYTES_PER_PIXELS
      Represents the number of bytes used to store the data of one pixel.

      Represents the height of the texture

      Represents the width of the texture

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Frees the texture from memory
      void draw(float x, float y)
      Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position
      void draw(float x, float y, float w, float h)
      Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position and with a given size
      void draw(float x, float y, float w, float h, boolean flipX, boolean flipY)
      Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position, with a given size and flipped or not
      void draw(float x, float y, float w, float h, float angle, boolean flipX, boolean flipY)
      Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position, with a given size and a given rotation, and flipped or not

      Gets the ID of the texture

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y)
        Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position
        Parameters:
        x - the x position where the image should be rendered
        y - the y position where the image should be rendered

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y,
                 float w,
                 float h)
        Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position and with a given size
        Parameters:
        x - the x position where the image should be rendered
        y - the y position where the image should be rendered
        w - the width of the drawn image
        h - the height of the drawn image

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y,
                 float w,
                 float h,
                 boolean flipX,
                 boolean flipY)
        Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position, with a given size and flipped or not
        Parameters:
        x - the x position where the image should be rendered
        y - the y position where the image should be rendered
        w - the width of the drawn image
        h - the height of the drawn image
        flipX - whether or not the image should be flipped horizontally
        flipY - whether or not the image should be flipped vertically

      • draw

        public void draw(float x,
                 float y,
                 float w,
                 float h,
                 float angle,
                 boolean flipX,
                 boolean flipY)
        Draws the pixel on the screen at a given position, with a given size and a given rotation, and flipped or not
        Parameters:
        x - the x position where the image should be rendered
        y - the y position where the image should be rendered
        w - the width of the drawn image
        h - the height of the drawn image
        angle - the rotation the image should be rendered with
        flipX - whether or not the image should be flipped horizontally
        flipY - whether or not the image should be flipped vertically

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Gets the ID of the texture
        Returns:
        the id of the texture

        public void destroy()
        Frees the texture from memory
